title: Interactive Exercise: Build a Simple Note-Taking App
description:
Create a simple note-taking application that can:
1. Write a new note to "notes.txt" (overwrite existing)
2. Add a note to "notes.txt" (append without erasing)
3. Read and display all notes from "notes.txt"
4. Handle FileNotFoundError if file doesn't exist when reading

**Your task:**
Implement three functions: write_note(), append_note(), and read_notes()

hints.text: For write_note: open('notes.txt', 'w'), file.write(note + '\n'), file.close(). For append_note: use 'a' mode. For read_notes: use 'r' mode and file.read().
